if.test: pager!=null and pager.rangeField!=null and pager.rangeArray!=null and pager.rangeArray.length==2

mapper.select:
select
from jw_teacher T
select count(*) from jw_teacher T
select * from jw_teacher where id=#{id}

select
from jw_teacher T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jw_teacher ( id, create_time, update_time, del, img_url, work_number, name, pinyin, initials, english_name, sex, tel, qq, weixin, email, nationality, nation, nation_name, native_place, document_type, document_num, teacher_num, province_id, province_name, city_id, city_name, county_id, county_name, address, political_face, birth_date, teacher_age, top_edu, graduate, major, begin_time, works, status, school_id, school_name, password, account, marital_status, register_status, open_id, device_id, person_type ) values ( #{id} , now() , #{updateTime} , #{del} , #{imgUrl} , #{workNumber} , #{name} , #{pinyin} , #{initials} , #{englishName} , #{sex} , #{tel} , #{qq} , #{weixin} , #{email} , #{nationality} , #{nation} , #{nationName} , #{nativePlace} , #{documentType} , #{documentNum} , #{teacherNum} , #{provinceId} , #{provinceName} , #{cityId} , #{cityName} , #{countyId} , #{countyName} , #{address} , #{politicalFace} , #{birthDate} , #{teacherAge} , #{topEdu} , #{graduate} , #{major} , #{beginTime} , #{works} , #{status} , #{schoolId} , #{schoolName} , #{password} , #{account} , #{maritalStatus} , #{registerStatus} , #{openId} , #{deviceId} , #{personType} )
mapper.update:
update jw_teacher
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=now(),
del=#{del},
img_url=#{imgUrl},
work_number=#{workNumber},
name=#{name},
pinyin=#{pinyin},
initials=#{initials},
english_name=#{englishName},
sex=#{sex},
tel=#{tel},
qq=#{qq},
weixin=#{weixin},
email=#{email},
nationality=#{nationality},
nation=#{nation},
nation_name=#{nationName},
native_place=#{nativePlace},
document_type=#{documentType},
document_num=#{documentNum},
teacher_num=#{teacherNum},
province_id=#{provinceId},
province_name=#{provinceName},
city_id=#{cityId},
city_name=#{cityName},
county_id=#{countyId},
county_name=#{countyName},
address=#{address},
political_face=#{politicalFace},
birth_date=#{birthDate},
teacher_age=#{teacherAge},
top_edu=#{topEdu},
graduate=#{graduate},
major=#{major},
begin_time=#{beginTime},
works=#{works},
status=#{status},
school_id=#{schoolId},
school_name=#{schoolName},
password=#{password},
account=#{account},
marital_status=#{maritalStatus},
register_status=#{registerStatus},
open_id=#{openId},
device_id=#{deviceId},
person_type=#{personType}
where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO jw_teacher ( id, create_time, update_time, del, img_url, work_number, name, pinyin, initials, english_name, sex, tel, qq, weixin, email, nationality, nation, nation_name, native_place, document_type, document_num, teacher_num, province_id, province_name, city_id, city_name, county_id, county_name, address, political_face, birth_date, teacher_age, top_edu, graduate, major, begin_time, works, status, school_id, school_name, password, account, marital_status, register_status, open_id, device_id, person_type ) VALUES
( #{teacher.id} , now() , #{teacher.updateTime} , #{teacher.del} , #{teacher.imgUrl} , #{teacher.workNumber} , #{teacher.name} , #{teacher.pinyin} , #{teacher.initials} , #{teacher.englishName} , #{teacher.sex} , #{teacher.tel} , #{teacher.qq} , #{teacher.weixin} , #{teacher.email} , #{teacher.nationality} , #{teacher.nation} , #{teacher.nationName} , #{teacher.nativePlace} , #{teacher.documentType} , #{teacher.documentNum} , #{teacher.teacherNum} , #{teacher.provinceId} , #{teacher.provinceName} , #{teacher.cityId} , #{teacher.cityName} , #{teacher.countyId} , #{teacher.countyName} , #{teacher.address} , #{teacher.politicalFace} , #{teacher.birthDate} , #{teacher.teacherAge} , #{teacher.topEdu} , #{teacher.graduate} , #{teacher.major} , #{teacher.beginTime} , #{teacher.works} , #{teacher.status} , #{teacher.schoolId} , #{teacher.schoolName} , #{teacher.password} , #{teacher.account} , #{teacher.maritalStatus} , #{teacher.registerStatus} , #{teacher.openId} , #{teacher.deviceId} , #{teacher.personType} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.* from jw_teacher T inner join jw_teacher_jw_role TR on T.id=TR.teacher_id inner join jw_role R on TR.role_id=R.id inner join jw_role_jw_perm RP on R.id=RP.role_id inner join jw_perm P on RP.perm_id=P.id and RP.school_id=P.school_id and type=1 where T.id=#{id} group by P.id

select
,GROUP_CONCAT(R.title) roleNames from jw_teacher T left join jw_teacher_jw_role TR on T.id=TR.teacher_id left join jw_role R on R.id=TR.role_id
group by T.id

select
from jw_teacher T
(T.account=#{tel} or T.tel=#{tel})
and T.password=#{password}

select * from jw_teacher T
(T.account=#{tel} or T.tel=#{tel})

SELECT id as teacherId, NAME as teacherName, img_url as imgUrl FROM jw_teacher WHERE school_id=#{schoolId} and person_type = 1
AND t1.id not in ( SELECT teacher_id from jy_collective_plan_teacher WHERE collective_plan_id= #{collectivePlanId})
AND concat( IFNULL(NAME, '')) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{teacherName}),'%')
GROUP BY id ORDER BY CONVERT (substr(NAME,1,1) using 'GBK')

SELECT P.* from jw_teacher T inner join jw_teacher_jw_role TR on T.id=TR.teacher_id inner join jw_role R on TR.role_id=R.id inner join jw_role_jw_perm RP on R.id=RP.role_id inner join jw_perm P on RP.perm_id=P.id and RP.school_id=P.school_id and type=1 where T.id=#{id} and P.url_path like '%dmScreenSaver%' group by P.id

SELECT t.id id,t.name name,p.name teacherjob,p.class_id class_id, CONCAT(p.grade_name,'（',p.class_name,'）','班') classes_name FROM `jw_teacher` t inner join jw_teacher_post p on t.id = p.teacher_id where p.dd_id = '74' and t.id=#{id}

select T.* ,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(c.`grade_name`,' ',c.`number`,'班',' ',c.`alias`) ORDER BY c.`grade_id`,c.`number`) AS teaching from ( select DISTINCT
from jw_teacher T LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tc.`teacher_id`,c.`grade_id` FROM jw_teacher_classes tc INNER JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tc.`classes_id`) c ON c.teacher_id = T.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tp.teacher_id,IFNULL(tp.grade_id,c.grade_id) AS grade_id FROM jw_teacher_post tp LEFT JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tp.`class_id` WHERE tp.grade_id IS NOT NULL OR tp.class_id IS NOT NULL) d ON d.teacher_id = T.id
AND (c.grade_id = #{gradeId} or d.grade_id = #{gradeId})
) T LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tc.`teacher_id`,c.`grade_name`,c.`grade_id`,c.`number`,jc.alias FROM jw_teacher_classes tc INNER JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tc.`classes_id` INNER JOIN jw_course jc ON jc.id = tc.`course_id` and jc.`school_id` = tc.`school_id` ) c ON c.teacher_id = T.id GROUP BY T.`id`

select count(DISTINCT T.id) from jw_teacher T LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tc.`teacher_id`,c.grade_id FROM jw_teacher_classes tc INNER JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tc.`classes_id`) c ON c.teacher_id = T.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tp.teacher_id,IFNULL(tp.grade_id,c.grade_id) AS grade_id FROM jw_teacher_post tp LEFT JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tp.`class_id` WHERE tp.grade_id IS NOT NULL OR tp.class_id IS NOT NULL) d ON d.teacher_id = T.id
AND (c.grade_id = #{gradeId} or d.grade_id = #{gradeId})

SELECT DISTINCT T.`work_number`,T.`name` as teacher_name ,c.`grade_name`,c.`number` as class_number,c.`alias` as subject_name from jw_teacher T LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tc.`teacher_id`,c.`grade_name`,c.`grade_id`,c.`number`,jc.alias FROM jw_teacher_classes tc INNER JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tc.`classes_id` INNER JOIN jw_course jc ON jc.id = tc.`course_id` and jc.`school_id` = tc.`school_id` ) c ON c.teacher_id = T.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tp.teacher_id,IFNULL(tp.grade_id,c.grade_id) AS grade_id FROM jw_teacher_post tp LEFT JOIN jw_classes c ON c.`id` = tp.`class_id` WHERE tp.grade_id IS NOT NULL OR tp.class_id IS NOT NULL) d ON d.teacher_id = T.id
AND (c.grade_id = #{gradeId} or d.grade_id = #{gradeId})
ORDER BY c.grade_id,c.number
